description.value:
Choose one of the Seeker's Bond options. You gain only the power associated with that option, and you can use the power only once per day. You are also considered to have that option for the purpose of meeting prerequisites and using the benefits tailored for it in certain powers.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.A50zSKCxatT8WeXv]{Bloodbond (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.m2ziLRKD7OWvNCwy]{Encaging Spirits}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.74fXYSVywFonMDq1]{Spiritbond (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.XIYGqCLT83QdZz4h]{Spirits' Rebuke}
